name: Trial of Sisyphus
description:
TRIAL OF SISYPHUS

An endless autorunner platformer based on the myth of Sisyphus. The player character, Sisyphus, starts from the underworld and climbs up a hill in hopes that he’ll escape his eternal torment, dodging boulders along the way.

CONTROLS:

Space to jump / double jump, down to slide.

CREDITS:

Tech Lead: Tyler D

Art Lead: Chloe A

Sound Design Lead: Manoel M

Game Director: Nikolai R
